title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Enhancing Teacher Education Design Capabilities Using Digital Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create lesson design documents applying three or more instructional design models (e.g., ADDIE, SAM) using digital platforms (Google Classroom, etc.)
Learners can perform peer evaluation and feedback using digital collaboration tools and improve instructional design competencies by at least 20%
Learners achieve cognitive (discussion participation), behavioral (task submission), and social (feedback sharing) learning engagement metrics at 80% or higher in online environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
